def.dt: :to feel respect or approval for (someone or something) I admired the way he handled the crisis. = I admired how he handled the crisis. We all admire her courage. = We all admire her for her courage. = She is much admired for her courage.
:to look at (something or someone) with enjoyment We gazed out the window and admired the scenery.

utxt.vi: a beautiful woman who has many admirers
She received many admiring glances as she walked into the room.
